attributes.action: Restore democracy to England by disqualifying anyone elected in a Scottish constituency from voting on matters pertaining to England and not having legislative effect in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current state of affairs is a disgrace.  We have Scottish MPs voting on issues which do not effect the constituencies they represent.  In some cases Scottish elected MPs have voted for  a matter in Scotland and against the same issue in England or vice versa.  This Labour Government has commenced the break up of the UK and having done so must live with the consequences even if that means they lose some 20 or so safe seats which hold dual representation in two parliaments.

rejection.details: This petition ovrlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EnglishQuestion/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
